name: Elixir of the Night
description: A potion that calms dreams and invites visions of the beyond.

name: Crimson Hex
description: Used to protect the caster by redirecting dark intentions.

name: Whispering Wind
description: Grants the ability to hear messages carried on the breeze.

name: Potion of Prosperity
description: Brews luck, fortune, and opportunity in abundance.

name: Veil of Shadows
description: Cloaks the user in temporary invisibility from spiritual forces.

name: Elixir of Eternal Youth
description: A rare potion that slows aging and revitalizes the spirit.

name: Dreamweaver's Brew
description: Enhances lucid dreaming and astral projection abilities.

name: Phoenix Tears
description: A healing potion that mends wounds and restores vitality.
